name: Last Thing Glitch Does
description:
My game submission for the #WowieJam4 && #LTGD #LTGDLTGJ game jams.

You are tasked with helping an AI not collide with itself by clicking and draging them around.

Includes 10 levels.

Controls Gameplay

Mouse - Click and drag to move A.I.'s

Space - Make the A.I.'s take one step

Enter - Test that the A.I.'s don't collide (will run through 100 steps)

General

J - Previous Screen/Puzzle

K - Next Screen Puzzle

R - Restart Puzzle

Notes
  1. You can place objects on top of eachother (including on the boxes) but they will be destroyed if you try run the game.
  2. This game contains no music, play it with your own playlist!

Built using a custom Typescript engine, and all art done by me. Click sound from https://sfxr.me/
